products.name: feature-flag-control-center-lite
products.label: Feature Flag Control Center (Lite Plan)
products.short_description: Your team's "on-off switch" for new features. Safely test, launch, and manage features in real-time, no code deployments needed.
products.long_description:
Want to launch new features faster, but worried about the risk? This deployable architecture gives you the power of **progressive delivery**. It deploys a free instance of the IBM Cloud App Configuration service, which provides a powerful dashboard for managing your application's features in real-time—**without needing a new code deployment for every change.**

As a Product Manager, this gives you direct control. This DA deploys the **free "Lite" plan** of the service. It's perfect for development, testing, internal applications, or getting started with feature flags at no cost.

features.title: Centralized PM Dashboard
features.description: A simple, web-based UI for you to manage all your features. No code required for you to make a change.

features.title: Controlled Rollouts
features.description: Safely test new features with a small percentage of users (e.g., "roll out to 5% of users") before a full launch.

features.title: User Segmentation
features.description: Create custom segments (like "beta-testers" or "internal-employees") and show features only to them.

features.title: Instant 'Kill Switch'
features.description: Instantly turn off a problematic feature without waiting for a developer or a hotfix.
